node.title: WA Nationals MP James Hayward arrested, charged with child sex offences
node.alt: A photo of a man with ginger hair and a blue suit smiling
node.description: Former Nationals WA president and current Member for the South West James Hayward is charged with a string of child sex offences relating to the alleged abuse of an eight-year-old girl earlier this year.
node.content: ["WA Nationals MP James Hayward has been charged with child sexual offences.", "It is understood the charges relate to the alleged\u00a0indecent assault of an eight-year-old girl earlier this year.", "He has been charged with three counts of indecent dealings with a child, one count of procuring a child to do an indecent act and one count of persistent sexual conduct.\u00a0", "Mr Hayward, the former state president of the Nationals WA and a former Bunbury councillor,\u00a0is due to appear in court in Perth this morning.", "The ABC has attempted to contact Mr Hayward and the WA Nationals.", "More to come."]
